property.name: status
property.description: The current status of an entity (e.g., "active", "pending", "approved").

property.name: isLatestVersionVisible
property.description: A flag indicating if the latest version of a quote request is visible.

property.name: quoteRequestReference
property.description: A unique reference for a quote request.

property.name: createdAt
property.description: The timestamp when an entity was created.

property.name: validUntil
property.description: The date until which an entity is valid.

property.name: versions
property.description: A collection of versions.

property.name: shownVersion
property.description: The version of a quote request shown to the user.

property.name: customer
property.description: A data object representing a customer.

property.name: email
property.description: The email address of a user or contact.

property.name: salutation
property.description: The salutation of a person (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr.).

property.name: firstName
property.description: The first name of a person.

property.name: lastName
property.description: The last name of a user or customer.

property.name: customerReference
property.description: A unique reference for a customer.

property.name: version
property.description: The version number of an entity.

property.name: versionReference
property.description: A reference to a specific version.

property.name: createdAt
property.description: The timestamp when an entity was created.

property.name: metadata
property.description: A collection of metadata.

property.name: cart
property.description: A shopping cart or quote object.

property.name: cartUuid
property.description: The universally unique identifier for a cart.

property.name: metadata
property.description: A collection of metadata.

property.name: priceMode
property.description: The mode for price calculation, typically "GROSS_MODE" or "NET_MODE".

property.name: store
property.description: The store context for an operation, determining which store's data is used.

property.name: currency
property.description: The currency used for a transaction or price.

property.name: totals
property.description: An object containing the calculated totals for an order or quote (e.g., subtotal, grandTotal).

property.name: billingAddress
property.description: The address used for billing purposes.

property.name: items
property.description: A collection of items, typically in a cart, order, or list.

property.name: expenseTotal
property.description: The total cost of all expenses in an order.

property.name: discountTotal
property.description: The total amount of discounts applied to an order.

property.name: taxTotal
property.description: The total amount of tax calculated for an order or quote.

property.name: subtotal
property.description: The total price of all items before discounts, taxes, and shipping are applied.

property.name: grandTotal
property.description: The final total of an order, including all costs and discounts.

property.name: priceToPay
property.description: The final amount that the customer has to pay.

property.name: displayName
property.description: A display name for an entity.

property.name: amount
property.description: A numerical value, often used for price, quantity, or discount.

property.name: code
property.description: A unique code, often for currency, country, or barcode.

property.name: salutation
property.description: The salutation of a person (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr.).

property.name: firstName
property.description: The first name of a person.

property.name: lastName
property.description: The last name of a user or customer.

property.name: address1
property.description: The first line of a street address.

property.name: address2
property.description: The second line of a street address.

property.name: address3
property.description: The third line of a street address.

property.name: zipCode
property.description: The postal code for an address.

property.name: city
property.description: The city part of an address.

property.name: country
property.description: The country associated with an address or entity.

property.name: iso2Code
property.description: The two-letter ISO code for a country.

property.name: company
property.description: A company entity.

property.name: phone
property.description: The phone number.

property.name: isDefaultShipping
property.description: A flag indicating if an address is the default for shipping.

property.name: isDefaultBilling
property.description: A flag indicating if an address is the default for billing.

property.name: sku
property.description: The Stock Keeping Unit, a unique identifier for a concrete product.

property.name: quantity
property.description: The number of units for an item.

property.name: groupKey
property.description: A key used to group items together, typically in a cart or order.

property.name: abstractSku
property.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for an abstract product.

property.name: amount
property.description: A numerical value, often used for price, quantity, or discount.

property.name: calculations
property.description: An object containing detailed price calculations for a cart item.

property.name: unitPrice
property.description: The price of a single unit of an item.

property.name: unitPrice
property.description: The price of a single unit of an item.

property.name: sumPrice
property.description: The total price for all units of an item (unitPrice * quantity).

property.name: taxRate
property.description: The tax rate applied to an item.

property.name: unitNetPrice
property.description: The price of a single unit of an item, excluding tax.

property.name: sumNetPrice
property.description: The total price for all units of an item, excluding tax.

property.name: unitGrossPrice
property.description: The price of a single unit of an item, including tax.

property.name: sumGrossPrice
property.description: The total price for all units of an item, including tax.

property.name: unitTaxAmountFullAggregation
property.description: The total tax amount for a single unit, including all associated options and expenses.

property.name: sumTaxAmountFullAggregation
property.description: The total tax amount for all units of an item, including all associated options and expenses.

property.name: sumSubtotalAggregation
property.description: The total subtotal for all units of an item, including options and expenses, before discounts.

property.name: unitSubtotalAggregation
property.description: The subtotal for a single unit, including options and expenses, before discounts.

property.name: unitProductOptionPriceAggregation
property.description: The total price of all selected options for a single unit of an item.

property.name: sumProductOptionPriceAggregation
property.description: The total price of all selected options for all units of an item.

property.name: unitDiscountAmountAggregation
property.description: The total discount amount applied to a single unit of an item.

property.name: sumDiscountAmountAggregation
property.description: The total discount amount applied to all units of an item.

property.name: unitDiscountAmountFullAggregation
property.description: The total discount amount for a single unit, including all associated options and expenses.

property.name: sumDiscountAmountFullAggregation
property.description: The total discount amount for all units of an item, including all associated options and expenses.

property.name: unitPriceToPayAggregation
property.description: The final price to pay for a single unit, after all discounts and including all options/expenses.

property.name: sumPriceToPayAggregation
property.description: The final price to pay for all units of an item, after all discounts and including all options/expenses.

property.name: isSuccessful
property.description: A boolean flag indicating if an operation completed successfully.

property.name: messages
property.description: A collection of informational, success, or error messages.

property.name: quoteRequest
property.description: A data object representing a customer's request for a price quote.

property.name: code
property.description: A Spryker specific error code.

property.name: status
property.description: A HTTP status code.

property.name: detail
property.description: A detailed error message providing more specific information about an issue.

property.description: A data object representing a customer.

property.name: items

property.name: customer
property.description: A data object representing a customer.

property.name: surrogateIdentifier
property.description: A system-generated, non-human-readable unique identifier (like an auto-incrementing ID).

property.name: naturalIdentifier
property.description: A human-readable unique identifier for a resource, such as a user's email.

property.name: companyUserTransfer
property.description: A data transfer object for a company user.

property.description: A boolean flag indicating if an operation completed successfully.

property.name: companyUser

property.description: The date until which an entity is valid.

property.name: quoteRequestVersions
property.description: A collection of quote request versions.

property.description: The latest version of a quote request.

property.name: latestVisibleVersion

property.name: quote

property.name: versionReference

property.name: metadata

property.name: value
property.description: A generic value for a property, often used in key-value pairs or translations.

property.name: message
property.description: A message providing information, success, or error details.

property.name: nbResults
property.description: The total number of results found for a query.

property.name: maxPerPage
property.description: The maximum number of items to show on a single page.

property.name: page
property.description: The current page number in a paginated result set.

property.name: quoteRequests

property.name: pagination
property.description: An object containing all pagination-related data for a list of results.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.description: A message providing information, success, or error details.

property.name: errorIdentifier
property.description: A unique identifier for a specific type of error.
